mapper.insert: insert into cart_tbl(gno, userNo, camount, cprice, gprice, gname) values(#{gno},#{userNo},#{camount},#{cprice},#{gprice},#{gname})
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart_tbl where userNo = #{userNo} and gno = #{gno}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_tbl WHERE userNo = #{userNo} AND gno = #{gno}

select cprice from cart_tbl where userNo=#{userNo}
